name: EXPERIMENTAL-People_Count_Spoof_Injection
description: Simulates person walking through frame to inflate people-counter analytics
expected_result: Adds 1 false 'person' to analytics count. Corrupts heatmaps and dwell time metrics. Creates phantom shopper paths.
limitations: Only works on cameras with AI analytics. Static threshold algorithms may filter out. Repeatable pattern may be detected by anomaly detection. Requires consistent 1.5-2m distance.
